recipe_name: Warm potato, mustard and dill salad
author: James Martin
method: Place the new potatoes into a large saucepan of boiling salted water and boil for 15 minutes, or until just cooked through. Drain the potatoes and place into a large bowl with all of the other ingredients. Mix well and serve warm.
ingredients: 250g/9oz new potatoes,  2 tbsp Dijon mustard,  drizzle of olive oil,  2 tbsp dill, chopped ,  salt and freshly ground black pepper
